citation: Proclamation under the Crimes (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Crimes (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2013

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Crimes (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2013 fix 1 September 2013 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

19 August 2013

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 August 2013

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
